name: Toaster
description: Client is a 44-year-old single father with a daughter aged 15, and two sons aged 10 and 9 years old. He is presently caring for his two sons who is living with him. While concerns remain for the children's care arrangements, client has been open to support and services from stakeholders. Currently, he is requesting for a toaster to help in his care for his two sons.

passiton.name: Toaster
passiton.description: Small toaster. Good for toasting slices of bread. China plug.

name: Fan
description:
Client (44/M) moved into a 1-room rental flat in Woodlands. He is a stroke recovered patient and has mental health conditions, leading to his inability to sustain employment. He has little family support. His current flat is completely unfurnished and require essential items:
*Washing Machine 
*Fridge 
*Bed, pillow and bedding set
*Wardrobe 
*Fan
*Television 
*Shelves

contact.org: Fei Yue Family Service Centre @ Champions Way
contact.name: Huang Wei Jie

passiton.name: Ventilation fan
passiton.description:
I have 2 KDK ventilation fans left to donate.

Delivery on weekday evening and weekend.

name: Mattress
description: Client is not working and has limited family support. She will benefit from donation of mattress. Thank you!
specifications: 91cm X 190cm 10cm. Single size. Firm Foam Mattress. Anti Allergic.
